鬤鬤鬤

鬤字的基本解释

鬤
ráng
（头发）散乱。

鬤字的汉语字典释义

[①]［ráng］
［《廣韻》汝陽切，平陽，日。］
［《廣韻》乃庚切，平庚，泥。］
毛发乱貌。

鬤字的康熙字典解释

【亥集上】【髟字部】　鬤； 康熙笔画：27； 页码：页1457第23
【廣韻】汝陽切【集韻】如陽切，?音穰。?鬤，亂毛貌。【玉篇】亂髮。【楚辭·大招】被髮鬤只。　又【集韻】汝兩切，音壤。義同。　又【廣韻】乃庚切【集韻】尼庚切。?與鬡同。詳鬡字註。

鬤字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
鬤字的起名意思

暂无。

Tie
Basic explanation of words
Tie
ráng
(Hair) Untidy.
Tie
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［ráng］
["Guangyun" Ruyang cut, Pingyang, day. ]
["Guangyun" is Gengqie, Pinggeng, Clay. ]
The hair is messy.
Tie
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Haiji Chapter 1】【髟字部】　鬤; Kangxi Strokes: 27; Page Number: Page 1457 Page 23
[Guangyun] Ruyang cut [Jiyun] Like Yang cut,? Yin Rang.鬤, messy appearance. [Jade articles] Random hair. [Songs of the Chu·Large Move] was sent out.　[Jiyun] You two cuts, the sound is earthy. The same meaning.　[Guangyun] Naigeng cut [Jiyun] Nigeng cut. ? Same as 鬡. Detailed notes on the word "Fu".
